formattedAddress: 132A Eldridge St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 132A Eldridge St, New York, NY 10002, USA

editorialSummary.text: Modern art featured at a gallery & events space with a print collection by major New York artists.

originalText.text: I first visited the Woodward Gallery in 2007 and since that time some of the finest and most innovative exhibitions I've seen in New York have been presented at this gallery. I was most recently at a new Woodward show two weeks ago.  An added plus is that the gallery not only presents the work of exceptional artists, they maintain close working relationships with their artists and often introduce them to the customers who purchase their work. It is perhaps the most artist/customer friendly gallery in the city. Kris and John Woodward present art and artists in the finest manner possible. Five stars forever.

text.text: I first visited the Woodward Gallery in 2007 and since that time some of the finest and most innovative exhibitions I've seen in New York have been presented at this gallery. I was most recently at a new Woodward show two weeks ago.  An added plus is that the gallery not only presents the work of exceptional artists, they maintain close working relationships with their artists and often introduce them to the customers who purchase their work. It is perhaps the most artist/customer friendly gallery in the city. Kris and John Woodward present art and artists in the finest manner possible. Five stars forever.

originalText.text:
The Woodward Gallery is, in my experience, the go-to Gallery for contemporary art. The owners, John and Kristine Woodward, are incredibly knowledgeable about the art and artists they represent. The range of art styles they have in the gallery is extensive, so the gallery has work to satisfy anyone interested in having art in their home and /or office. The gallery’s prices are fair, and the attention the Woodwards give their clients is wonderful; people who are just starting to collect art get as much attention as long-standing knowledgeable collectors.

I am happy to give the Woodward Gallery a 5-star review. I’m only sorry I can’t give them more.

originalText.text: Woodward Gallery features many wonderful emerging artists in contemporary fine art. Kristine and John are both professional and amazing to work with! We have had nothing but very positive experiences over the past 20 years with this gallery.

text.text: Woodward Gallery features many wonderful emerging artists in contemporary fine art. Kristine and John are both professional and amazing to work with! We have had nothing but very positive experiences over the past 20 years with this gallery.

originalText.text: Woodward Gallery is a vital and innovative presence in the New York art world. Their exhibitions never cease to inspire. John and Kristine Woodward and their staff care deeply about their artists and collectors, and do what they do so well because they are motivated first and foremost by their love of art!

text.text: Woodward Gallery is a vital and innovative presence in the New York art world. Their exhibitions never cease to inspire. John and Kristine Woodward and their staff care deeply about their artists and collectors, and do what they do so well because they are motivated first and foremost by their love of art!

originalText.text: As an artist represented by Woodward Gallery, I have found them to have a true and lasting commitment to their artists. Through thick and thin times, their patience and support remains constant. In this day and age of the fast paced art world, it’s hard to find art dealers with the kind integrity and purpose that I’ve found in Woodward Gallery.
